SCTX - Script Source:
scn mwMQAzuraScript

short state
float timer
float timer2
float timer10

Begin GameMode

	if ( MenuMode == 1 )
		return
	endif

	if ( state == -1 )
		set timer to ( timer + GetSecondsPassed )
		if ( timer > 9 )
			if ( GetDisabled == 0 )
				Disable
			endif
		endif
		return
	endif

	if ( GetDisabled == 0 )
		if (GetStage fbmwMQ14 < 20)	;gets set when heart is wacked
			Disable
		endif
	endif

	if ( GetDisabled == 1 )
		if (	GetStage fbmwMQ14 >= 20 )		;gets set when heart is wacked
			Enable
			set state to 2
		endif
	endif

;show up
	if ( state == 2 )
		if ( GetDistance, Player < 450 )
			PlayGroup FastForward 1	;fading in/appearing
;MessageBox "TEST: WITHIN DISTANCE TO APPEAR"
			set state to 5
			Return
		endif
	endif

	if state==5
		set timer10 to (timer10+GetSecondsPassed)
		If Timer10>=2.5
			PlayGroup Forward 1
			Set state to 6
		endif
	endIF

;wait till pc gets closer
	if ( state == 6 )
;wait till player gets close
		if ( GetDistance, Player < 250 )
			DisablePlayerControls
;MessageBox "TEST: WITHIN DISTANCE FOR MOVIE"
			set state to 10
		endif
	endif

;has appeared, start talking
	if ( state == 10 )
		if ( timer < 3 )
			set timer to ( timer + GetSecondsPassed )
			return
		endif
		PlayBink "mwend.bik" 1
		set state to 20

	endif


	if ( state == 20 )

		PlayGroup Backward 1	
		set state to 30
	endif

	if ( state == 30 ) && Timer2<3
		Set timer2 to Timer2+GetSecondsPassed

	Elseif ( state == 30 ) && Timer2>=3
		Set state to 40
	EndIF

	if ( state == 40 )

		EnablePlayerControls
		mwAzuraREF.MoveTo mwHoldingCellMarker
		mwAzurasRing.Enable
		fxAzuraBeam1.Enable
		fxAzuraBeam2.Enable
		fxAzuraCollisionBox.Enable
		SetStage fbmwMQ14 50
		set state to -1
		set timer to 0
		"2akulaSdoorSb".Rotate z 0
		"2akulaSdoorSa".Rotate z 0
	endif


end 

;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 8 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>
